altername_name: F1 Race Stars Powered Up Edition
name: F1 Race Stars: Powered Up Edition
overview: F1 RACE STARS: POWERED UP EDITION takes FORMULA ONE over the top with new content for Wii U, including four extra tracks and bonus accessory packs! Featuring official cars and stars, use awesome power-ups on famous circuits transformed to feature jumps, loop-the-loops and shortcuts, then share the fun in split-screen!
